title: Samsung starts rolling out One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3
content:
One UI 4.1 is the newest iteration of Samsung’s custom skin, and it comes preinstalled on the Galaxy S22 series. While One UI 4.1 is currently exclusive to Samsung’s 2022 flagships, the South Korean smartphone maker plans to bring the new software to many older Galaxy phones. In a blog post today, Samsung announced that

The post Samsung starts rolling out One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out the One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 4. Read on to know more.
